EmailTemplate.name: Single Line Object Owner is changed
EmailTemplate.subject: Single Line Owner Change - {!Single_Line__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Single_Line__c.PSR_Owner__c},
The owner of the Single Line "{!Single_Line__c.Name}" has been changed.
New Owner of the Single Line is: "{!Single_Line__c.OwnerFullName}".
Thanks,
